he Hammer of Tyr was a holy relic of the church of Tyr, god of justice.
A powerful weapon against evil and the undead, it could cast extraordinarily powerful turn undead and sunray spells, as well as heal allies. The Hammer could be also be used as a +5 warhammer and when thrown it returned to the wielders hand.
Perhaps the Hammers greatest power was to destroy pools of darkness when thrown into its waters.
